vlive.korean: [뼛속 깊이 사무치는 외로움 mov] - 아 15일날 했어요? 엄청 늦게 했네? - 네! [Lonliness that digs down to one's bones.mov] - It was on the 15th? That's so late. - Yes! 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 예고 졸업생들의 첫 로맨스 여행♥ㅣ[리얼하이로맨스(Real High School Romance)] EP 1ㅣ청불 졸업
vlive.english: [Lonliness that digs down to one's bones.mov] - It was on the 15th? That's so late. - Yes!
